name: Grozer the Thunderclap Tyrant
text:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner Fiend monsters
During your opponent's Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can target 1 Effect Monster on the field; discard 1 monster, and if you do, negate the targeted monster's effects until the end of this turn. You can only use this effect of "Grozer the Thunderclap Tyrant" once per turn. If a Fiend monster(s) is sent from the hand to your GY: You can apply 1 of these effects to this card until the end of this turn.
? Cannot be destroyed by battle.
? Cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects.
? Your opponent cannot target this card with card effects.
